data.system_settings: (Doesn’t matters) Windows 10 Professional Latest Insider Build Turkish
data.client_settings: It can be any Chrome based Discord
data.expected_result: It should either resize the player or not allow to send the file.
data.short_description: If you send a video thats 50x50 pixels or smaller that will look like a dot and it will play the video with audio when clicked.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a video with any supported software. - Export it as 50x50 or less pixel [i thought it was 2x2 only thanks to <@363699988628373504> for testing it with different sizes) keep the ratio 1:1) - Send it over Discord as mp4, avi, mov or webm to someone that uses desktop client.
